InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S2 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 2

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: M3A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 1

The M3A is Behring's entry level laser autocannon. The autocannon configuration offers modest damage per projectile and a fairly low rate of fire. As the most basic offering in Behring's weapons lineup, it features low power consumption, but poor power efficiency. It makes up ground for its shortcomings by being cheap, a feature many pilots are looking for when outfitting their ships on a budget.

InstalledItem.Name: Reliant Toshima Turret
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Turret (Reliant Exclusive)
Manufacturer: MISC
Size: 4

Specifically built to be used exclusively on the MISC Reliant, the Toshima turret system comes with a camera that can be remoted into while providing a wide range of motion for two Size-2 weapons.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-227 Badger Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 2

The CF-227 Badger is Klaus & Werner’s dependable size two repeating laser. Its increased output and high rate of fire make it a solid contender in any fight.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-227 Badger Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner

Size: 2

InstalledItem.Name: Reliant Missile Launcher Cap
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Launcher Cap
Manufacturer: MISC
Size: 5 

Bespoke missile launcher cap used by the MISC Reliant.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-322 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 2xS2

Behring’s MSD-322 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.

InstalledItem.Description:

Manufacturer: Seal Corporation
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Tried, tested, and refined for centuries, the WEB shield generator balances sleek design with stellar performance to keep your ship safe under a wide variety of circumstances.

InstalledItem.Name: ArcticStorm
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd. 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

If you’re after a cooler that balances performance, durability and stealth, then look to the ArcticStorm. This mid-grade cooler from Lightning Power Ltd uses their centuries old technology to provide performance that can be relied upon.
